Name: Maxx Royal Kemer Resort
Description:
With its unique, award-winning architecture inspired by nature's essential elements, “water, earth, air and fire”, Maxx Royal Kemer Resort introduces a one-of-a-kind holiday experience. Standing out with its “Maxx Inclusive” concept, tailor-made services and elegantly-designed suites and villas, Maxx Royal Kemer Resort offers its guests the most exquisite and unforgettable vacation of their lives.

Situated between two secluded bays, Maxx Royal Kemer Resort is surrounded by fragrant pine forests and frequented by friendly wildlife, including the occasionally inquisitive mountain goats. Thanks to Maxx Royal Kemer Resort's three private beaches, guests can savour the sea and the sun to the fullest. While the 400-meter Long Beach offers unlimited swimming pleasure with its expansive coast, natural ambiance and private pavilions, the 200-meter Middle Bay Beach is ideal for families thanks to its exclusive area for children. Standing out with its fine sands, Tangerine Beach offers adrenaline-filled moments with a wide range of water sports options.

Address.Street: Kiriş Mah. Sahil Yolu Cad. No:88
